subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Brian Vickers angered a legion of Dale Earnhardt Jr. fans with his last-lap maneuver at Talladega, but perhaps no one is more upset with him than people on his own team.
snippet: Brian Vickers angered a legion of Dale Earnhardt Jr. fans with his last-lap maneuver at Talladega, but perhaps no one is more upset with him than people on his own team.
